resources.string: Want to see our pick of the top post on TheCampusFeed per day? Be sure to follow us on Twitter at @The_Campus_Feed!

Are you sure you wish to flag this post as inappropriate? Posts with a certain amount of flags per views are automatically removed. Do your part for the TheCampusFeed community and flag any post that:

 • Is offensive, bad-natured, or threatening
 • Targets a specific person negatively to the point of bullying
 • Has a phone number
 
Users that have more than one post taken down get banned from posting on the app again.

TheCampusFeed is an anonymous message board. No logins, no accounts. Anyone can view any college\'s feed, as well as the All Colleges feed which is a mixture of all colleges\' posts put together. You can upvote any post or comment from any college, but you must be near the college in order to downvote, make your own post, or make your own comment.\n\nIf you make a post that gets a certain amount of flags, it will be automatically removed. If you have multiple posts removed, you will be banned from posting to the app. Think before you post! To view the rules, click the Flag icon for any post near you.
